Input: Welcome to 5th grade! Please have the following on the first day of school:
- 1 large pencil case that should hold: -
- 4 sharpened pencils with erasers (no lead pencils) ''
Also you will need on the first day of school:
1 package of loose leaf (white Tined paper)
Public Library card (for assignments and projects)
1 baby picture for the year book
in an envelope $15 for senior dues with your child's name on it
